meanings.sent1: Every morning, breakfast occurs in the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: Rain occurs frequently in the spring season.
meanings.sent3: The funny part occurs when the cat chases its own tail.
meanings.sent4: A brilliant idea occurs like a light bulb turning on in your mind.
meanings.sent5: Learning to ride a bike occurs with practice and patience.

meanings.sent1: The meeting occurs at noon in the conference room.
meanings.sent2: Family gatherings occur during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The magic show occurs when the magician pulls a rabbit out of a hat.
meanings.sent4: A change of heart occurs like a flower blooming in spring.
meanings.sent5: The transition from day to night occurs gradually.

meanings.sent1: The predicted event occurs exactly as foretold.
meanings.sent2: Accidents occur unexpectedly and can be prevented.
meanings.sent3: The twist ending occurs when the hero turns out to be the villain.
meanings.sent4: A realization occurs like a light shining in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: Success occurs when hard work meets opportunity.
